content:
Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where the familiar dialog would not stay up
- Fixed an issue where the DLC prices were not showing up on the familiar DLC dialogs
- Fixed an issue where the familiar button would not show up at all
- Fixed an issue where boss areas did not advance with 3 or 4 clicker familiars active
title: Early Access Update #27.1

content:
Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where the new familiar DLC was not awarding the correct number of potions (we have also re-credited all prior purchases so you now have the proper number of potions).
title: Early Access Update #27.2

content:
Features:
- Added the Festival of Fools event, our ninth limited-time campaign event! See the in-game FAQ for more information. The event will run until Tuesday, April 10th at noon PDT

Changes:
- Added weird apple-style rubber banding to the Champion bar for some reason
- Familiars will no longer cease buying upgrades when the specialization dialog is up
- Familiars will no longer click things that can't be damaged by clicking

Fixes:
- Fixed an issue with Familiars skipping upgrades in certain situations
title: Early Access Update #28

content:
Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where Strix would get stuck after transforming back from her Ultimate.
- Fixed an issue where monsters with segmented heath bars would cause progressive lag.
title: Early Access Update #28.1

content:
Fixes:
- Minor text fixes
- Ultimates that do a lot of hits (like Celeste's) should now do the correct number of hits to armor-based health monsters, like the Frost Giants
- Made several fixes to Strix's ultimate that should improve stability and remove some animation bugs
title: Early Access Update #28.2

content:
Features:
- Added a new weekend buff promotion

Fixes:
- Added several races to Jarlaxle's check for unique races (tortles, half-orcs, halflings, and gnomes)
-  Scrolling panels are less broken
title: Early Access Update #28.3

content:
Fixes:
- Armored hit-based enemies (like the Frost Giant) are no longer clicked by familiars
- Fixed some typos. Left in some others so reporters don't get complacent
- Fixed an issue where Strix's ultimate could sometimes cause Strix to stop attacking
title: Early Access Update #28.4

content:
Features:
- Added the Greengrass event, our tenth limited-time campaign event! See the in-game FAQ for more information. The event will run until Tuesday, April 24th at noon PDT

Changes:
- Many tweaks and optimizations related to builds for other platforms; please report anything odd that you see

Fixes:
- The Ability popup for Champions will now update changing properties (like Time Remaining) properly
- Fixed a bug where a hero with disabled Abilities (e.g. from a stun attack) would say it had disabled Damage instead
- Fixed a bug where the health bar for hits-based monsters might not update correctly when they received healing
- Fixed a bug where if you did multiple hits to a single monster in quick succession the damage popup could animate improperly
title: Early Access Update #29

content:
Features:
- Added Companion's Weekend promo

Fixes:
- Purchase buffs will no longer say that they expire when you reset your Adventure (since they don't)
- Fixed the Champion level up button not updating when you get enough gold to level them up (if you have UI Caching on)
- Fixed a tutorial issue when you get the Swapping tutorial and your available swap is off the Champion bar
- Fixed an issue with spacing in the name of the Silver Nrakk chest
title: Early Access Update #29.1

content:
Fixes:
- Weekend Promo buffs will no longer say they expire when you reset your Adventure
- Fixed some description errors on abilities that cause enemies to take extra damage (e.g. Ruby Weakness, Poor Hygiene)
- Fixed a bug where the Running of the Saurs area 50 boss spawning animation could prevent you from changing to different areas
- Fixed an issue where Familiar slots could get stuck after a reset
title: Early Access Update #29.2

content:
Features:
- Added five new variant adventures:
    - Escort to Waterdeep: Constant Banditry
    - Waterdeep Detours: Easily Distracted
    - Underdeep Cartography: Durable Deep
    - The Templar's Camp: Poor Guidance
- Rescue in the Jungle: Upholding the Law
- Added a panel to the reset screen that shows statistics about the completed adventure
- Monster types are now displayed when hovering over a monster, and hovering also brings their name and health bar to the front
- Added a new hotkey that toggles scientific notation (Y)
- Free Play adventures now show the original adventure name in the quest display
- Selected level-up multiplier is now remembered through reloads
- Autoprogress is now turned on by default when starting a new adventure
- Added a Community Champion achievement for players that "showcase outstanding community leadership" (Does not appear or count towards achievement total if not earned)
- If you get a golden item and already have a shiny item in that slot, you will now receive a bonus potion of polish which you can use to make a different item shiny
- Added a power-up bar that displays when bosses or monsters begin to power up

Clarification (no actual change):
- Barrowin's Blessed Hammer skill description changed to specify that it only buffs base attacks

Balance Changes:
- Added additional upgrades to all Champions, including a new "Bond" specialization choice for Asharra at level 350
- Zorbu's Favored Enemy upgrades now start with a 300% bonus damage instead of 100%

Changes:
- Hero boxes in the bottom bar have additional signifiers to show that they are in the formation
- Nrakk and Strix's ultimate attack tooltips/hovers will no longer show a damage value, as they don't do damage directly
- Updated the "Welcome Back" screen
- Upgrades that affect ultimate attacks now use the same icon as upgrades that unlock ultimate attacks 
- Spending divine favour warning changed to be more descriptive
- Adjusted the behavior of scroll panes

Fixes:
- Pressing 'Esc' while opening chests no longer closes the chest screen.
- Fixed several typos. You've almost found them all, but several more remain. Keep searching!
- Nrakk's ultimate description should now contain the correct buff amount based on all his ultimate bonuses (from gear, etc.)
- The description for Nrakk's Deft Strike should now show the proper buffed value
- Fixed a case where the shiny effect on cards in the Blacksmith Contract dialog could animate incorrectly

Coming Soon:
- Fixes for offline gold and party DPS calculations with certain Champions
title: Early Access Update #30

content:
Features:
- Added the Running event, our eleventh limited-time campaign event! See the in-game FAQ for more information. The event will run until Tuesday, May 15th at noon PDT

Balance Changes:
- Updated the ages of all the Companions of the Hall (Bruenor, Regis, and Drizzt)

Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where Champions could occasionally get revived from Strix with incorrect health
- Fixed a bug where formation saves could load unavailable Champions into the formation
- Fixed some more typos
title: Early Access Update #31
